1.0.name: wordpress/bohemiaa-social-fan-box
1.0.description:
This plugin is compatible with Wordpress 2.9+.

If you have a page in Bohemiaa about your blog and want to show the Bohemiaa Fan Box with the recent updates and fans, just activate this widget or insert this line of code anywhere in your theme

Where:

  • CSS: The URL to your own style sheet bohemiaa-fan-box/fanbox.css.
